title: #NDCDecides: Zanetor Has My Blessings To Contest Rawlings
content: Former President Jerry John Rawlings has said attempts by some political figures in the National Democratic Congress (NDC) to make his daughter, Zanetor, unpopular will not work . In an interview with Citi News during an inspection of the dredging of the Korle lagoon, spearheaded by his daughter, the former President said Zane ......
